title: 月梅圖－兩個月亮
titleEn: Plum Blossoms Under Twin Moons
description: 水月交輝混沌開，乾坤萬象自徘徊，四時風物何為粹，凜冽寒梅獨占魁。
descriptionEn: In the dance of water and moonlight, chaos unfolds, As heaven and earth in myriad forms behold. What essence do the seasons’ winds convey? Amidst the chill, the lone plum blossoms sway.

title: 源頭應是天上來─瀑布
description: 歲歲朝朝萬斛流，濺花滌盡古今愁；源頭應是天上來，沾溉群生永不休。

title: 北海濡墨雲作紙－黃山煙雲
titleEn: Ink-Soaked Clouds over the North Sea: The Ethereal Mists of Huangshan
description: 北海濡墨雲作紙，黃山松壑不凡塵；此景只在天上有，我為畫圖永傳神。
descriptionEn: In the North Sea, ink-soaked clouds serve as paper, While the pines of Huangshan rise above the mundane; Such scenes exist only in the heavens, I strive to capture them, immortalizing their spirit in art.

title: 墨竹(直)
titleEn: Ink Bamboo (Vertical)

title: 夢筆插花山為盆－黃山煙雲
titleEn: Dreams of Ink: Blossoms on the Huangshan Peaks
description: 夢筆生花有若無，筆架橫陳景色殊；奇峰縹緲昇天去，我繪黃山入畫圖。
descriptionEn: In dreams, my brush gives birth to flowers, though they seem to fade away; The pen rest lies across, a scene so rare and far away. Strange peaks rise ethereal, ascending to the skies, I paint the grandeur of Huangshan, captured in my eyes.

title: 天地有大美－美國大峽谷
titleEn: The Grandeur of Nature: The American Grand Canyon
description: 雲煙無去住，天地有大美。
descriptionEn: Clouds and mist drift without a trace, In the vastness of heaven and earth, beauty reigns supreme.

title: 梅嶺如雲－風櫃斗梅花林
titleEn: Clouds Over Plum Ridge
description: 盡日尋春不見春，芒鞋踏遍隴頭雲。歸來笑拈梅花嗅，春在枝頭已十分。
descriptionEn: All day I seek for spring, yet spring eludes my sight, With straw sandals I tread the clouds atop the hills in flight. Returning, I smile as I pluck the plum blossoms to inhale, For spring is already blooming, abundant on the boughs so frail.

title: 水中石
titleEn: Stone Beneath the Water
description: 雲白悠悠，水綠盈盈，蘆花夙夙，橫古亙今，浩瀚無涯。
descriptionEn: Clouds drift softly, waters shimmer bright, Reeds whisper gently, bridging past and present, Endless and vast, a boundless expanse.

title: 無心任始終—雲海(金宣)
titleEn: Unfettered Through Time
description: 白雲生遠岫，搖曳入晴空。乘化隨舒卷，無心任始終。
descriptionEn: White clouds rise from distant peaks, Swaying gently into the clear sky. Riding the winds of change, Unconcerned, I drift through beginnings and ends.

title: 煙聲畫外流－煙聲瀑布
titleEn: Whispers of Smoke Beyond the Canvas - The Cascade of Mist
description: 青天垂素練，洗盡古今愁；欲借丹青筆，煙聲畫外流。
descriptionEn: Beneath the azure sky, a silken veil descends, Cleansing the sorrows of ages past and present; Yearning to borrow the brush of vermilion hue, To capture the whispers of smoke beyond the canvas.

title: 煙雲情境
titleEn: Veils of Mist and Emotion
description: 道之為物，惟恍惟惚。惚兮恍兮，其中有象。恍兮惚兮，其中有物。窈兮冥兮，其中有精。（老子‧道德經）
descriptionEn: The essence of the Dao is elusive and indistinct; In its vagueness, there lies a form. In its obscurity, there exists substance. Profound and mysterious, it harbors the essence. (Laozi, Dao De Jing)

title: 煙霧中的花影－阿勃勒
titleEn: Floral Shadows in the Mist – The Yellow Trumpet
description: 黃花舞煙蘊，天地成大美；盈盈無去住，淡中有真味。
descriptionEn: In the dance of yellow blooms, the mist conceals their grace; In the embrace of heaven and earth, true beauty finds its place. With gentle presence, ever flowing, neither here nor there, In subtlety, the essence lingers, a taste beyond compare.

title: 白雲慈母心－北極熊
titleEn: A Mother's Heart Beneath White Clouds – Polar Bear
description: 極目長望白雲深，天地無私慈母心。
descriptionEn: Gazing far into the depths of white clouds, Heaven and earth share a mother's boundless love.

title: 秋波千萬情－天光雲影
titleEn: Autumn's Waves of Endless Emotion – Light and Shadow
description: 雲藏出塵心，煙戲眾樹影；窩居堪逍遙，秋波千萬情。
descriptionEn: Clouds conceal a heart untainted, Smoke dances with the shadows of many trees; In my cozy retreat, I find blissful ease, As autumn's waves whisper countless feelings.

title: 紫藤雙燕
titleEn: Wisteria and Twin Swallows
description: 一雙好鳥飛自在，萬縷紫煙舞韶華。
descriptionEn: A pair of fine birds soar with ease, As myriad strands of purple smoke dance through the springtime's grace.

title: 聚葉潑成千點墨－畫菊
titleEn: Splashes of Ink from Gathered Leaves – Painting Chrysanthemums
description: 詩餘戲筆不知狂，豈是丹青費較量？聚葉潑成千點墨，攢花染出幾痕霜。淡濃神會風前影，跳脫秋生腕底香。莫認東籬閑采掇，黏屏聊以慰重陽。
descriptionEn: After the verses, I playfully wield my brush, unaware of my own fervor; Is it truly worth comparing to the artistry of ink and color? Gathering leaves, I splash a thousand dots of ink, While clustering flowers, I dye a few traces of frost. In the subtle interplay of light and shade, I grasp the shadows before the wind, Escaping the fragrance of autumn that lingers beneath my wrist. Do not mistake the idle gathering at the eastern fence, For I cling to the screen, seeking solace on the Double Ninth Festival.

title: 自在飛花輕似夢－雨中紫藤
titleEn: Dreamlike Blossoms in the Rain – Wisteria's Whisper
description: 自在飛花輕似夢，無邊絲雨細如愁。
descriptionEn: Carefree, the flying blossoms drift like dreams, Endless, the fine rain falls, delicate as sorrow.

title: 逸氣攬群空－中橫煙雲
titleEn: Ethereal Essence Embracing the Vastness – Clouds over Central Peaks
description: 崇山峻嶺雲深處，寺塔巍巍矗峰巔；深壑長橋橫曲水，緣邀山客共佛緣。
descriptionEn: In the depths of lofty mountains and clouds, The temple tower stands majestically atop the peak; A long bridge spans the deep ravine, crossing winding waters, Inviting mountain guests to share in the bond of Buddha's grace.

title: 雪壩煙雲
titleEn: Snowy Dunes and Misty Clouds
description: 紛紛風雪遍茫茫，山徑登臨曲且長；行健乾坤常惠物，歲寒古柏漫留香。
descriptionEn: In swirling winds and snow so vast, The mountain path winds long and cast; With steadfast strength, the world bestows, The ancient cypress scents the snows.

title: 雲蒸霞蔚－雲揚阿里山
titleEn: Clouds Ascend, Dawn Glows – The Majesty of Alishan
description: 雲蒸霞蔚、神采飛揚，眾美所赴、萬妙所歸，無為無形、有情有信，參贊化育、天人合一。
descriptionEn: Clouds rise and mist gathers, spirits soar high; To the gathering of beauty, to the essence of all wonders. Formless and effortless, yet filled with emotion and trust; In harmony with nature, the unity of heaven and humanity.

title: 墨荷-青煙裊裊冷香飄
titleEn: Ink Lotus - Cool Fragrance in Wisps of Azure Smoke

title: 秋瀑-空水澄鮮一色秋
titleEn: Autumn Cascade: A Harmony of Clear Waters
description: 清流飛瀑出長空，空水澄鮮一色秋；萬里煙聲常在目，白雲紅葉兩悠悠。
descriptionEn: Pure streams cascade from the vast sky, Where clear waters reflect the autumn's hue; A thousand miles of misty echoes linger in sight, While white clouds and red leaves drift gently anew.

title: 萬古長空，一朝風月
titleEn: Eternal Skies, A Moment of Wind and Moon
description: 滿目青山，隨緣不變，上善若水，無為自然；見素抱樸，披褐懷玉，萬古長空，一朝風月。105
descriptionEn: In a realm of verdant hills, I remain unchanged, flowing with fate; The highest virtue is like water, effortless and natural. Embracing simplicity, I cherish the essence, Clad in humble garb, yet harboring jade within. In the timeless expanse of eternity, A single moment reveals the beauty of wind and moon.

title: 塔山晨曦映清秋
titleEn: Morning Light on Tower Mountain: A Clear Autumn Unveiled
description: 塔山晨曦映清秋，無邊風景入畫圖。
descriptionEn: In the morning light of Tower Mountain, autumn's clarity unfolds, Boundless landscapes weave into a painted scroll.

title: 海天競秀一龍洞
titleEn: Dragon's Cave: Where Sea and Sky Compete in Beauty
description: 滾滾浪捲萬頃波，蒼蒼石疊千仞峰；飛鳥翔雲百里游，海天競秀一龍洞。
descriptionEn: Endless waves roll, sweeping vast seas, Amidst towering peaks, stone stacks rise in majesty; Birds soar and glide, traversing clouds for miles, Where ocean and sky compete in beauty, a dragon's cave.

title: 菜瓜園圃多逸趣
titleEn: Whimsies in the Gourd Garden
description: 菜瓜園圃多逸趣，恬淡沖和寫天真。
descriptionEn: In the garden of gourds, where leisure blooms, Serenity and grace unveil the innocence of the heart.

title: 萬縷紫煙飛自在
titleEn: A Myriad of Violet Wisps in Free Flight
description: 萬縷紫煙飛自在，一枝藤影繫深情。
descriptionEn: A myriad of violet wisps soar freely, While a single vine's shadow binds deep affection.

title: 頌母恩
titleEn: Ode to Maternal Grace
description: 誰言寸草心，報得三春暉。
descriptionEn: The heart of a blade of grass, who would say, Can repay the warmth of spring's embrace?

title: 別有天地非人間
titleEn: Beyond the Mortal Realm
description: 問余何事棲碧山，笑而不答心自閒。桃花流水窅然去，別有天地非人間。
descriptionEn: Ask me why I dwell upon the verdant hills, I smile and remain silent, my heart at ease. Peach blossoms drift away with the flowing stream, In another realm, far beyond the mortal world.

title: 合歡雲擁映山紅－合歡杜鵑
titleEn: Clouds of Harmony Embracing Mountain Reds – Rhododendron
description: 雲浮千里白，笑擁萬山紅；遙望雲歸處，合歡自在同。
descriptionEn: Clouds drift a thousand miles in white, While laughter embraces mountains clad in red; From afar, I gaze where the clouds return, In harmony, we find our joy together.

title: 墨竹-虛心是吾師
titleEn: Bamboo in Ink - Humility, My Teacher
description: 筆寫胸中竹，凌雲勁節姿；春風常化育，虛心是吾師。
descriptionEn: With pen I inscribe the bamboo of my heart, Its noble stance defies the clouds above; The spring breeze nurtures all in gentle art, With humble spirit, I find my guiding love.

title: 太魯峽谷
titleEn: Taroko Gorge
description: 太魯峽谷胸中墨，龍蟠九曲方外山。
descriptionEn: In the heart of Taroko Gorge, ink flows deep, Where dragons coil 'round the mountains, beyond the winding peaks.

title: 山村寧靜凡塵遠
titleEn: Tranquility of the Mountain Village, Away from the Mundane
description: 山村寧靜凡塵遠，雲山環抱護田庄。
descriptionEn: In the tranquil mountain village, far from worldly cares, Cloud-clad peaks embrace, safeguarding the homestead fair.

title: 山高水長
titleEn: Endless Heights and Flowing Waters
description: 飛瀑行遠琴三弄，碧桃笑拈方外山。
descriptionEn: Amidst the distant echoes of cascading waterfalls, the qin plays its three melodies; The jade peach blossoms smile, plucking at the mountains beyond the world.

title: 岸立無絃琴－北海岸鼻頭角
titleEn: Silent Lute by the Shore: Cape Bitou
description: 岸立無絃琴，浪敲太古音；長歌頌海韻，墨筆寫深心。
descriptionEn: Upon the shore stands a silent lute, Waves strike the echoes of ancient tunes; In a long song, I praise the sea's rhythm, With ink and brush, I inscribe my deepest heart.

title: 慈母恩深千萬潯－六十石山
titleEn: A Mother's Love, Profound as Countless Streams
description: 金針煙籠六十石，慈母恩深千萬潯。
descriptionEn: Golden needles shrouded in mist, sixty stones in weight, A mother's love, profound as countless streams that flow.

title: 梅花－筆寫冰魂，風清月白。
titleEn: Plum Blossoms – Inscribing the Soul of Ice, in the Clarity of Wind and Brightness of Moon
description: 非暗之香，是疏之影；筆寫冰魂，風清月白。
descriptionEn: Not the fragrance of darkness, but the shadow of elegance; With a brush, I inscribe the soul of ice, as the wind is pure and the moon is bright.

title: 楓紅萬點舞秋聲－秋瀑
titleEn: Autumn's Dance of Crimson Leaves
description: 銀瀑三疊歌自在，楓紅萬點舞秋聲。
descriptionEn: Silver cascades in threefold song, Maple leaves dance, a myriad in autumn's embrace.

title: 母親的愛
titleEn: A Mother's Love
description: 母親的愛-是寸草春暉中唱不完的歌聲
descriptionEn: The love of a mother—an endless melody sung in the tender light of spring's embrace.

title: 母親花笑微微
titleEn: Mother's Blossoms in Gentle Laughter
description: 翠葉青青，花開如雲，春暉煦煦，芬芳滿園。2018母親節前夕
descriptionEn: Emerald leaves of vibrant hue, Flowers bloom like clouds anew. Spring's warm light, a gentle grace, Fragrance fills this cherished place. Eve of Mother's Day, 2018.

title: 水聲流琴韻－秋瀑
titleEn: Melody of Water: Autumn Waterfall
description: 水聲流琴韻，山色入畫屏。(秋瀑)
descriptionEn: The sound of water flows like the melody of a zither, Mountain hues blend into the painted screen. (Autumn Waterfall)

title: 漁歌一唱千峰響
titleEn: Echoes of the Fisher's Song
description: 漁歌一唱千峰響，古曲三疊萬象生。
descriptionEn: The fisher's song, once sung, echoes through a thousand peaks; Ancient melodies, in threefold harmony, give rise to myriad forms.

title: 濯足萬里流
titleEn: Cleansing Feet in Endless Flow
description: 圓形小山水【濯足萬里流】一洗塵心萬斛泥
descriptionEn: Round hills and flowing waters, Where I cleanse my feet in a thousand miles, Washing away the dust of my heart, A myriad of muds now left behind.

title: 煙擁合歡－合歡梯田
titleEn: Mist-Kissed Harmony: The Joyful Terraces
description: 煙擁合歡，霧潤良疇，碧山含笑，雲凝翠黛，天然節奏，有象文章，風光綿延，機趣無窮。
descriptionEn: Embraced by mist, the joyful blooms unite, Dew-kissed fields in gentle light. Emerald hills wear a smiling grace, Clouds gather, painting nature's face. With rhythms born of nature's art, In every form, a tale to impart. Scenic vistas stretch far and wide, Endless charm in the world's tide.

title: 煙波萬頃寫秋江
titleEn: Autumn River in Misty Waves
description: 煙波萬頃寫秋江
descriptionEn: In the misty waves, a thousand acres paint the autumn river.

title: 玉山北峰雲在飛
titleEn: Clouds in Flight over Jade Mountain's North Peak
description: 玉山北峰/雲在飛/飛在  剎那/定格  永恆/永恆是/企盼千年的/回眸一笑/淺淺的/在筆端/綻放
descriptionEn: North Peak of Jade Mountain, Clouds in flight, Soaring in a fleeting moment, Frozen in eternity. Eternity is A smile cast back After a thousand years of longing, Gently blooming At the tip of the brush.

title: 秋聲笑染映山紅
titleEn: Autumn's Laughter Tints the Crimson Hills
description: 杳杳雲山融物我，秋聲笑染映山紅。
descriptionEn: In the distant clouds and mountains, I blend with nature's grace, The autumn's laughter paints the hills in hues of crimson embrace.

title: 穹蒼萬頃，是我家鄉。(黃山煙雲)
titleEn: Vast Skies, My Homeland
description: 江山嬌麗，質樸蘊寓，法象流長，滋生不息，煙波勁湧，凌空無盡，古松盎然，造物機心；心與物遊，依仁由藝，筆寫天地，墨染雲霞，大鵬展翅，自在翱翔，穹蒼萬頃，是我家鄉。
descriptionEn: The landscape is enchanting, rich in simplicity and depth, A legacy of form that flows endlessly, nurturing life anew. Waves rise fiercely, soaring into the boundless sky, Ancient pines flourish, a testament to nature's craft. With heart and matter in harmony, guided by virtue and art, I inscribe the universe with my brush, Inked with the hues of clouds at dusk. The great roc spreads its wings, soaring freely, The vast expanse of heaven is my homeland.

title: 筆走雷霆萬壑鳴－夏瀑
titleEn: Thunderous Brushstrokes over Summer Falls
description: 墨潑飛瀑三千尺，筆走雷霆萬壑鳴。
descriptionEn: Inky splashes cascade three thousand feet, As the brush dances, thunder echoes through the valleys deep.

title: 花香常伴彩雲飛-梅花
titleEn: Fragrance of Blossoms Amidst Floating彩 Clouds - Plum Blossom
description: 清風入硯寫冬梅，紅白相間喜共陪；筆舞蒼龍千點墨，花香常伴彩雲飛。
descriptionEn: With the clear breeze entering the inkstone, I inscribe the winter plum; In hues of red and white, joyfully they accompany me. As the brush dances like a azure dragon, a thousand dots of ink emerge, The fragrance of blossoms forever mingles with the flying彩 clouds.

title: 菅芒花的春天－龜山島
titleEn: Spring of the Reed Flowers – Turtle Mountain Island
description: 萬頃菅芒，浩浩湯湯，龜山渺渺，屹立蒼茫!煙波徜徉，詩心商商。雲水深處，是我家鄉。
descriptionEn: In fields of reeds that stretch for miles, Where waters flow in endless aisles, Mount Turtle stands, a distant sight, Amidst the vastness, bold and bright. In misty waves, my thoughts do roam, A poet's heart finds here its home. In depths of clouds and waters wide, There lies my cherished countryside.

title: 萬頃煙聲寄相思－冬瀑
titleEn: Misty Echoes of Longing – Winter Falls
description: 千潯飛瀑飄雪白，萬頃煙聲寄相思。
descriptionEn: Thousand streams cascade, snowflakes drift in white, Ten thousand acres of misty sounds convey my longing.

title: 笑拈一籃春光好
titleEn: A Basket of Spring's Radiance
description: 笑拈一籃春光好
descriptionEn: With a smile, I gather a basket of splendid spring light.

title: 菩提花開
titleEn: Blossoms of Bodhi
description: 菩提花開照眼明
descriptionEn: The Bodhi blooms, illuminating the eye.

title: 雲煙萬頃春山好
titleEn: Spring Mountains in Endless Mist
description: 雲煙萬頃春山好，飛瀑千潯落曉天；筆寫深心師造化，悠悠流水向人間。
descriptionEn: Amidst vast clouds and mist, the spring mountains bloom, While cascading waterfalls greet the dawn's embrace; With a brush, I inscribe the heart's depths, shaped by nature, As the gentle stream flows, weaving through the realm of man.

title: 雲煙萬頃，飛瀑千潯。―筆寫深心師造化
titleEn: Vast Clouds and Cascading Falls: A Heartfelt Tribute to Nature
description: 雲煙萬頃春山好，飛瀑千潯落曉天；筆寫深心師造化，悠悠流水向人間。
descriptionEn: In the vast expanse of spring mountains, clouds and mist weave a splendid scene; As waterfalls cascade in myriad streams, they greet the dawn's gentle embrace. With pen, I inscribe the depths of my heart, shaped by nature's hand; While the flowing waters meander softly, carrying whispers to the world of men.

title: 臨懷仁集王羲之聖教序
titleEn: Homage to Wang Xizhi: The Sacred Teachings

title: 菩提花開照眼明
titleEn: Bodhi Blossoms Illuminate
description: 菩提花開照眼明
descriptionEn: The Bodhi blossoms bloom, illuminating the eyes.

title: 飛瀑聲千里–伊瓜蘇瀑布
titleEn: Echoes of the Cascades
description: 飛瀑聲千里，煙濤影萬重。
descriptionEn: The sound of the waterfall stretches a thousand miles, While the misty waves cast shadows in countless layers.

title: 飛瀑聲千里，煙濤影萬重。―煙聲瀑布
titleEn: Echoes of the Cascading Falls
description: 飛瀑聲千里，煙濤影萬重。
descriptionEn: The sound of the waterfall echoes for a thousand miles, While the misty waves cast shadows in layers untold.

title: 桃江兩岸正逢春
titleEn: Spring Along the Peach River Banks
description: 墨染雲山參造化，桃江兩岸正逢春。
descriptionEn: Inky hues stain the cloud-clad peaks, While spring graces both banks of Peach River.

title: 合歡新秋
titleEn: New Autumn of Hehuan
description: 秋雲渺渺舞蒼穹，芒草迎風虎杖紅；墨染千山常自在，合歡松雪有無中。
descriptionEn: In the autumn, clouds drift and dance in the vast sky, While the reeds sway in the wind, and the red of the tiger stick glows; Ink-stained mountains dwell in tranquil freedom, As the snow on the hehuan pine blurs the line between presence and absence.

title: 園圃山村多逸趣
titleEn: Joy in the Garden and Village
description: 園圃山村多逸趣，喜從平淡見天真。
descriptionEn: In the garden and village, joy abounds, Delight springs from simplicity, where innocence is found.

title: 墨染秋林天地心
titleEn: Inked Autumn Woods: Heart of Earth and Sky
description: 如椽白木蒼穹筆，墨染秋林天地心
descriptionEn: 如椽白木蒼穹筆， With a brush of white wood, like a great pen against the vast sky, 墨染秋林天地心。 Inked with the hues of autumn, it colors the heart of earth and heaven.

title: 墨染雲山參造化  桃江兩岸正逢春
titleEn: Inky Peaks and Spring's Embrace by the Peach River
description: 墨染雲山參造化，桃江兩岸正逢春。
descriptionEn: Inky hues stain the cloud-kissed peaks, While spring graces both banks of the Peach River.

title: 墨染雲山參造化-桃花源
titleEn: Inky Peaks and the Peach Blossom Spring
description: 墨染雲山參造化，桃江兩岸正逢春。
descriptionEn: Inky hues stain the cloud-kissed peaks, While spring graces both banks of Peach River.

title: 墨池一夜西風起-菊花
titleEn: Autumn Whispers in the Ink Pool
description: 墨池一夜西風起，染出東籬片片秋。
descriptionEn: In the ink pool, the western wind rises through the night, Dyeing the eastern fence with fragments of autumn's light.

title: 天行健君子以自強不息―伊瓜蘇瀑布
titleEn: The Heavens' Strength: A Gentleman's Unyielding Pursuit
description: 天行健，君子以自強不息。
descriptionEn: The heavens move with strength; A gentleman strives ceaselessly for self-improvement.

title: 如椽白木蒼穹筆
titleEn: Skyward Pen of White Wood
description: 如椽白木蒼穹筆，墨染秋林天地心
descriptionEn: 如椽白木蒼穹筆， With a pen of white wood, vast as the sky, 墨染秋林天地心。 Inked with hues of autumn, the heart of earth and heaven.

title: 妙筆生花喜解語-牡丹
titleEn: Flourishing Thoughts: The Peony's Whisper
description: 妙筆生花喜解語，從容落墨壽澤長。
descriptionEn: With a deft hand, flowers of thought take flight, In tranquil strokes, may longevity's ink flow bright.

title: 孔雀紫藤
titleEn: Peacock and Wisteria
description: 紫藤飄自在，孔雀翠羽翹；喜借丹青筆，春風不費招。
descriptionEn: Wisteria drifts in freedom's grace, Peacock feathers rise in emerald embrace; Delighted to borrow the painter's brush, Spring breeze calls forth without a rush.

title: 安得一龍洞，悠然立水涯。
titleEn: A Serene Haven by the Water's Edge
description: 朝霞生海隅，白浪舞韶華；安得一龍洞，悠然立水涯。
descriptionEn: Morning glow rises at the sea's edge, where white waves dance in youthful splendor; How I long for a dragon's cave, to stand serenely by the water's brink.

title: 寸草春暉-康乃馨
titleEn: Tender Grass in Spring's Embrace - Carnation
description: 寸草春暉，親恩浩浩，欲報之德，昊天罔極。
descriptionEn: In the gentle warmth of spring, like tender grass, The boundless love of parents, vast as the heavens. To repay such grace, a debt that knows no end, Under the endless sky, my heart seeks to express.

title: 巧遇-相逢即是有緣
titleEn: Serendipity - Encounters of Fate
description: 巧遇-相逢即是有緣
descriptionEn: Serendipity - A Meeting is Destiny

title: 巧遇-相逢即是有緣-墨荷
titleEn: Serendipity - Encounters of Fate: Ink Lotus
description: 巧遇-相逢即是有緣
descriptionEn: Serendipity - A Meeting is Fate

title: 張家界之冬
titleEn: Winter in Zhangjiajie
description: 萬山紫氣凝飛雪，一片冰心在玉壺。
descriptionEn: In the myriad mountains, purple mist gathers like flying snow, A heart of pure ice rests within the jade pot.

title: 張家界之春
titleEn: Spring in Zhangjiajie
description: 呎尺分濃淡，高深見渺茫；白雲出遠岫，會心共徜徉。
descriptionEn: Measured in shades of light and dark, profound depths reveal the vast unknown; White clouds drift from distant peaks, in shared understanding we wander free.

title: 愛蓮說-荷花
titleEn: Ode to the Lotus
description: 周敦頤-愛蓮說(全文)
descriptionEn: 周敦頤的《愛蓮說》落款可以翻譯為： **Zhou Dunyi** 這樣的翻譯保留了詩詞的作者名稱，並且簡潔而優雅。若需要更具詩意的表達，可以考慮： **By Zhou Dunyi** 這樣的翻譯同樣保持了作者的身份，並且在語感上更符合英語的表達習慣。

title: 文心自在舞芳菲
titleEn: The Heart of Literature Dances Amidst Blossoms
description: 文心自在舞芳菲
descriptionEn: The heart of literature dances freely amidst the blossoms.

title: 春瀑-彩筆舞春風
titleEn: Spring Waterfall - Brushes Dance in the Spring Breeze
description: 飛瀑來天外，江流圖畫中；鴻濛開浩蕩，彩筆舞春風。
descriptionEn: A waterfall descends from the heavens, While rivers flow within the painted scene; Vast and boundless, the mist unfolds, As vibrant brushes dance in the spring breeze.

title: 森情
titleEn: Woodland Sentiment
description: 森情
descriptionEn: Forest Affection

title: 滿地白雲關不住
titleEn: Unbound by Clouds
description: 滿地白雲關不住，任他流水向西東。
descriptionEn: The clouds blanket the ground, yet cannot be confined; Let the waters flow freely, to the west and the east.

title: 滿地白雲關不住  任他流水向西東
titleEn:
Unbound by Endless White Clouds,  
Let the Waters Flow East and West
description: 滿地白雲關不住，任他流水向西東。
descriptionEn: Endless white clouds cannot be confined, Let the waters flow freely, east and west.

title: 濤聲-觀石梯坪
titleEn: Echoes of Waves - Gazing at the Stone Steps
description: 濤聲-觀石梯坪
descriptionEn: The Sound of Waves - Observing the Stone Steps Platform

title: 牡丹-妙筆生花喜解語
titleEn: Peony - Joyful Words from a Masterful Brush
description: 妙筆生花喜解語，從容落墨壽澤長。
descriptionEn: With a deft pen, joy in words unfolds, In tranquil strokes, may longevity be told.

title: 牡丹-雍容華滋舞清和
titleEn: Peony - Graceful Elegance in Serene Harmony
description: 雍容華滋舞清和
descriptionEn: The graceful elegance dances in serene harmony.

title: 白雲出遠岫，會心共徜徉。
titleEn: White Clouds from Distant Peaks, Wandering in Harmony
description: 呎尺分濃淡、高深見渺茫；白雲出遠岫，會心共徜徉。
descriptionEn: With measures of depth and shade, vastness reveals its haze; White clouds emerge from distant peaks, together we wander in blissful gaze.

title: 空裡凌霄一枝春
titleEn: A Branch of Spring in the Void
description: 自在飛羽三弄影，空裡凌霄一枝春。
descriptionEn: With carefree wings, I dance thrice in shadows' play, In the vastness, a single branch heralds spring's array.

title: 空裡凌霄一隻春(凌霄)
titleEn: A Spring Ascends in the Boundless Sky
description: 自在飛羽三弄影，空裡凌霄一隻春
descriptionEn: Certainly! The translation of the closing lines of the poem could be rendered as: With carefree wings, shadows dance in threefold grace, In the boundless sky, one spring ascends in solitary embrace. This translation aims to preserve the poetic essence and imagery of the original text.

title: 紫藤
titleEn: Wisteria Blossoms

title: 紫雪凌空舞，隨風自在飄。
titleEn: Dancing in Violet Snow, Floating with the Breeze
description: 紫雪凌空舞，隨風自在飄。
descriptionEn: In violet snow, I dance through the skies, Floating freely, swayed by the gentle breeze.

title: 自在飛羽三弄影，空裡凌霄一隻春
titleEn: Three Whispers of Free-Soaring Feathers, A Spring in the Sky

title: 般若波羅蜜多心經(隸書)

title: 菊花

description: 墨池一夜西風起，染出東籬片片秋。
descriptionEn: In the ink pool, the western wind rises through the night, Dyeing the eastern fence with fragments of autumn's light.

title: 萬壑松風圖
titleEn: Pine Winds in a Thousand Valleys

title: 雍容華滋舞清和-牡丹
titleEn: Graceful Resplendence: Dance of Serenity - Peony
description: 雍容華滋舞清和
descriptionEn: Graceful and resplendent, dancing in serene harmony.

title: 飛瀑聲千里，煙濤影萬重。
titleEn: Echoes of Waterfalls, Shadows of Mist
description: 飛瀑聲千里，煙濤影萬重。
descriptionEn: The sound of cascading waterfalls stretches a thousand miles, While misty waves cast shadows in countless layers.

title: 山花藍如海―觀霧繡球
titleEn: Mountain Blooms, Ocean Blue: A Glimpse of Misty Hydrangeas
description: 山花籃如海，雙羽舞翩翩；笑拈含煙翠，揮筆寫大千。
descriptionEn: In a basket of mountain blooms, like an ocean they spread wide, With twin wings dancing gracefully, in the gentle breeze they glide. With laughter, I pluck the misty greens, in hand, the brush I wield, To inscribe the vastness of the world, where dreams and beauty yield.

title: ㄧ溪春水，萬縷相思
titleEn: Spring Waters, Threads of Longing
description: 點輕鴨ㄧ溪春水，寫墨竹萬縷相思。
descriptionEn: With gentle strokes, I sketch the spring waters where the ducks glide, In ink, I weave a thousand strands of longing for you.

title: 一笑水雲中–春山飛瀑
titleEn: A Smile Amidst Water and Clouds – Spring Mountains and Cascading Falls
description: 飛瀑凌空舞，春山萬縷風；深心師造化，一笑水雲中。
descriptionEn: Waterfalls dance in the air, spring mountains weave a myriad of winds; In the depths of my heart, I learn from nature's art, a smile amidst the clouds and water.

title: 上善若水-浩瀚伊瓜蘇
titleEn: The Highest Goodness: Boundless Iguazu
description: 上善若水
descriptionEn: The highest goodness is like water.

title: 合歡峰頂沐春風–合歡山杜鵑
titleEn: Spring Breeze at Hehuan Peak – Rhododendrons in Bloom
description: 金光萬縷舞蒼穹，笑拈杜鵑映日紅；浩瀚雲天融物我，合歡峰頂沐春風！
descriptionEn: Golden rays dance in the azure sky, With a smile, I pluck the red azalea blooming bright; In the vast expanse where clouds and I unite, At the peak of Hehuan, I bask in the spring breeze's light!

title: 天上人間–桃花源
titleEn: Peach Blossom Paradise: Between Heaven and Earth
description: 天上人間
descriptionEn: Between Heaven and Earth

title: 太魯閣之春
titleEn: Spring in Taroko
description: 青山多逸趣，白水有清音。
descriptionEn: The verdant hills abound with charm, The crystal waters whisper pure melodies.

title: 太魯閣之春-長春祠
titleEn: Spring in Taroko: The Hall of Eternal Spring
description: 清山多逸趣，白水有清音。
descriptionEn: The tranquil mountains hold myriad delights, While the pure waters whisper a clear melody.

title: 小楷心經-楷書
titleEn: Delicate Heart Sutra in Small Script

title: 小楷心經-隸書

title: 忘形-紫藤
titleEn: Wisteria in Abandon
description: 忘形
descriptionEn: Forget the Form

title: 悠然立水涯―龍洞
titleEn: Tranquil Stand by the Water's Edge – Dragon Cave
description: 朝霞生海隅，白浪舞韶華；安得一龍洞，悠然立水涯。
descriptionEn: Morning glow rises by the sea's edge, white waves dance in youthful splendor; How I long for a dragon's cave, where I may stand at the water's brink in tranquil repose.

title: 悠遊
titleEn: Serene Wanderings
description: 悠遊
descriptionEn: Leisurely Wanderings

title: 春山飛瀑
titleEn: Spring Mountains and Flying Waterfalls
description: 飛瀑凌空舞，春山萬縷風；深心師造化，一笑水雲中。
descriptionEn: The cascading waterfall dances in the air, While spring mountains whisper with myriad winds; In the depths of my heart, I learn from nature's art, A smile emerges amidst the water and clouds.

title: 枝頭小鳥迎風立-櫻花
titleEn: Little Birds on the Branches: A Dance in the Wind
description: 枝頭小鳥迎風立，可愛深紅兼淺紅。
descriptionEn: Atop the branches, little birds stand in the wind, Charming hues of deep and light crimson blend.

title: 枝頭小鳥迎風立，可愛深紅兼淺紅。
titleEn: Little Birds on the Branches, Embracing the Wind in Crimson Hues
description: 枝頭小鳥迎風立，可愛深紅兼淺紅。
descriptionEn: Atop the branches, little birds stand against the wind, Charming hues of deep and light crimson blend.

title: 桐花千點白
titleEn: A Thousand White Blossoms
description: 桐花千點白，煙水ㄧ溪青；萬境隨心轉，天開物外形。
descriptionEn: With a thousand white blossoms of the tung tree, a stream of misty green flows; In harmony with the heart, myriad realms transform, as heaven unveils the forms beyond.

title: 桐花千點，煙水ㄧ溪
titleEn: A Thousand White Paulownia Blossoms by a Misty Stream
description: 桐花千點白，煙水ㄧ溪青；萬境隨心轉，天開物外形。
descriptionEn: The paulownia blooms in a thousand white dots, A stream of mist and water, a tranquil green; In myriad realms, the heart's desires shift, Heaven unveils forms beyond the seen.

title: 歸
titleEn: Return
description: 歸
descriptionEn: Return

title: 水遠花紅
titleEn: Crimson Blossoms by Silent Waters
description: 水遠無聲以潤物，花紅有象自迎春。
descriptionEn: The waters flow silently, nourishing all around, While blossoms bloom in crimson, heralding spring's arrival.

title: 水遠花紅-桃花源
titleEn: Crimson Blossoms by the Distant Waters: The Peach Blossom Spring
description: 水遠無聲以潤物，花紅有象自迎春。
descriptionEn: The water flows silently, nourishing all around, While blossoms bloom in crimson, heralding spring's arrival.

title: 江流浩蕩-尼加拉瀑布金秋
titleEn: Majestic Currents: Autumn at Niagara Falls
description: 江流化飛瀑，浩蕩育群生。
descriptionEn: The river flows, transforming into a cascading waterfall, Majestic and vast, nurturing all living beings.

title: 泊
titleEn: Harboring
description: 泊
descriptionEn: Anchored

title: 清音
titleEn: Crystal Harmony
description: 清音
descriptionEn: Pure Melody

title: 清風入畫圖-墨竹
titleEn: Bamboo in the Gentle Breeze
description: 竹影隨風舞，清風入畫圖。
descriptionEn: The shadows of bamboo dance with the breeze, As the gentle wind paints a serene scene.

title: 清風搖曳疏竹影–墨竹
titleEn: Whispers of Bamboo in the Gentle Breeze
description: 清風搖曳疏竹影，日報平安到吾家。
descriptionEn: Gentle breeze sways the shadows of sparse bamboo, The sun brings news of peace to my home.

title: 清風竹影-墨竹
titleEn: Whispers of Bamboo in the Breeze
description: 竹影入晴川，清風亦暢然；深心師造化，墨寫有情天！
descriptionEn: Amidst the bamboo shadows, they dance upon the clear stream; The gentle breeze flows freely, a spirit unconfined. In the depths of my heart, I learn from nature's art, With ink, I inscribe a world imbued with tender grace.

title: 清風竹影–墨竹
titleEn: Whispers of Bamboo in the Clear Breeze
description: 竹影入晴川，清風亦暢然；深心師造化，墨寫有情天！
descriptionEn: Bamboo shadows dance upon the clear stream, A gentle breeze flows freely, it would seem; In deep heart, I learn from nature's art, With ink, I inscribe a world of heartfelt dream!

title: 瀟湘ㄧ曲在吾廬–墨竹
titleEn: Melodies of Xiao and Xiang in My Abode – Ink Bamboo
description: 凌雲抱節疏篁影，偶寫數竿清有餘；翠竹迎風歌萬象，瀟湘ㄧ曲在吾廬。
descriptionEn: Embracing the lofty clouds, the slender bamboos cast their shadows wide, By chance, I pen a few strokes, with clarity that lingers inside; Emerald bamboos greet the breeze, singing of myriad scenes, While the melodies of Xiao and Xiang flow gently in my abode's serene.

title: 瀟湘ㄧ曲在吾盧-墨竹
titleEn: Melody of Xiao and Xiang in My Abode - Ink Bamboo
description: 凌雲抱節疏篁影，偶寫數竿清有餘；翠竹迎風歌萬象，瀟湘ㄧ曲在吾盧。
descriptionEn: Embracing the clouds, I hold to the noble spirit, shadows of sparse bamboos dance; By chance, I inscribe a few rods, their clarity abundant. Emerald bamboos greet the wind, singing of myriad forms, While the melody of Xiao and Xiang lingers within my humble abode.

title: 無題
titleEn: In Silence
description: 無題
descriptionEn: Untitled

title: 當下即是
titleEn: The Present Moment
description: 方抬眼處，霞光萬丈；照古鑑今，觸目菩提！
descriptionEn: At the moment I raise my gaze, the radiant clouds stretch far and wide; Illuminating the past and present, the sight of Bodhi stirs the heart!

title: 相依-棕梠
titleEn: In Mutual Embrace - Palm Fronds
description: 相依
descriptionEn: The translation of the closing phrase 相依 can be rendered as In Mutual Dependence. This captures the essence of companionship and connection inherent in the original phrase while maintaining an elegant and poetic tone.

title: 秋菊
titleEn: Autumn Chrysanthemums
description: 墨池一夜西風起，染出東籬片片秋。
descriptionEn: In the ink pool, the western wind rises through the night, Dyeing the eastern fence with fragments of autumn's light.

title: 稻花香
titleEn: Aroma of Rice Blossoms
description: 稻花香
descriptionEn: Fragrance of Rice Blossoms

title: 竹報平安-墨竹
titleEn: Bamboo Whispers of Peace
description: 清風搖曳疏竹影，日報平安到吾家。
descriptionEn: Gentle breeze sways the shadows of sparse bamboo, As the sun brings news of peace to my humble abode.

title: 竹影婆娑舞–墨竹
titleEn: Dancing Shadows of Bamboo
description: 竹影婆娑舞，清風入畫圖。
descriptionEn: Bamboo shadows sway and dance, As the gentle breeze paints the scene.

title: 自在-文心蘭
titleEn: Serenity - Orchid of the Mind
description: 文心自在舞芳菲―寫胸中逸氣
descriptionEn: With a free spirit, I dance among the blossoms— Expressing the unrestrained thoughts within my heart.

title: 自在飛花–紫藤
titleEn: Free-spirited Blossoms – Wisteria
description: 寫胸中造化，迎萬古長空。
descriptionEn: Inscribe the wonders of my heart, Embrace the eternal expanse above.

title: 般若波羅密多心經-楷書
titleEn: Heart Sutra of Prajnaparamita - In Regular Script

title: 般若波羅密多心經-隸書
titleEn: Heart Sutra of Prajnaparamita - Clerical Script

title: 花開富貴喜相逢-牡丹
titleEn: Joyful Encounter of Blossoms and Prosperity - Peony
description: 花開富貴喜相逢
descriptionEn: Blossoms bloom, wealth and honor meet in joyful encounter.

title: 陶然忘機
titleEn: Serenity in Abandon
description: 陶然忘機心不遠，綠蔭深處柳含煙。

title: 願把金針度與人–六十石山金針花
titleEn: Wishing to Share the Golden Needle
description: 縹緲雲山映目新，黃花萬頃菩提身，丹青揮灑六十石，願把金針度與人。
descriptionEn: In the misty mountains, new visions arise, Golden blooms stretch vast, a Bodhi's guise. With brush in hand, I paint sixty stones, Wishing to share the golden needle's tones.

title: 飛瀑濤聲舞太和-初見伊瓜蘇
titleEn: Symphony of Cascades: First Encounter with Iguazu
description: 飛瀑濤聲舞太和-初見伊瓜蘇
descriptionEn: Amidst the cascading waters, the sound of the falls dances in harmony - A first glimpse of Iguazu.

title: 點輕鴨ㄧ溪春水
titleEn: Whispers of Spring: A Duck on the Stream
description: 點輕鴨ㄧ溪春水，寫墨竹萬縷相思。
descriptionEn: Gently touching the duck on the spring waters of the stream, In ink, I inscribe a thousand strands of longing for you.

title: 五代文藝禪師(幽鳥語如篁)
titleEn: Zen Master of the Five Dynasties (Whispers of the Hidden Bird)

title: 出塵不染心
titleEn: A Heart Untainted by the World
description: 荷塘萬朵無須折，看取出塵不染心。
descriptionEn: In the lotus pond, countless blooms need not be plucked; Behold, a heart untouched by worldly dust.

title: 古月－潑墨山水
titleEn: Ancient Moon - Ink Splash Landscapes
description: 古月－青梅超象外，古月照今塵。
descriptionEn: Ancient Moon - The green plums transcend the mundane, While the ancient moon illuminates the dust of today.

title: 吾心似秋月(漢隸)
titleEn: My Heart Like the Autumn Moon
description: 己丑唐寒山子禪詩吾心似秋月南投縣玉山美展入選
descriptionEn: In the Year of the Earth Ox, By the hand of Tang Han Shan, A Zen poem: My heart resembles the autumn moon. Selected for the Yushan Art Exhibition, Nantou County.

title: 夢溪春尚好，染墨泛輕舟
titleEn: Spring's Grace by Dreaming Stream, Ink-Stained Drift
description: 夢溪春尚好，染墨泛輕舟。
descriptionEn: In spring's embrace by Dreaming Stream, With ink-stained hands, I drift on a gentle boat.

title: 大造本無方
titleEn: Boundless Creation
description: 大造本無方，云何是應住；既從空中來，應向空中去。
descriptionEn: The grand creation knows no bounds, How can it be confined to a place? Having come from the void above, It must return to the void in grace.

title: 天下父母心(帛書創作)
titleEn: The Heart of Parents Across the World

title: 天光雲影共徘徊─新中橫夫妻樹
titleEn: Heavenly Light and Cloud Shadows in Harmony: The Couple's Tree
description: 夫妻情長意綿延，雲海靈動常為伴；天光穿空來相映，清風有心去復還。
descriptionEn: In love, our bond stretches far and wide, With the ethereal clouds as our constant guide; Heaven's light breaks through, a radiant embrace, While the gentle breeze returns with grace.

title: 天行健
titleEn: Celestial Vigor
description: 天行健，君子以自強不息。
descriptionEn: The heavens move with vigor; A gentleman strives for self-improvement without rest.

title: 奕奕君子風(墨竹)
titleEn: Noble Spirit of the Gentlemen (Ink Bamboo)

title: 好春光(甲骨文條幅)

description: 好春光(甲骨文條幅)
descriptionEn: Splendid Spring Light (Oracle Bone Script Scroll)

title: 姑蘇寒霧繞雲村
titleEn: Misty Embrace of Cloud Village in Suzhou
description: 姑蘇寒霧繞雲村，涓涓江流溪邊石；仙瀑飛傾映遠岫，玄靜碧翠畫古詩。104
descriptionEn: In Suzhou, cold mists embrace the village of clouds, Gentle streams flow by the stones at the brook's edge; Celestial waterfalls cascade, reflecting distant peaks, In tranquil emerald hues, an ancient poem is sketched.

title: 山川雄渾木華茲
titleEn: Majestic Mountains and Rivers, Adorned with Nature's Splendor
description: 山川雄渾木華茲，萬頃煙雲畫真趣。105
descriptionEn: The mountains and rivers stand majestic, adorned with the splendor of nature; Endless vistas of mist and clouds paint a scene of true delight.

title: 山水有清音
titleEn: Echoes of Clarity in Mountains and Waters
description: 山水有清音
descriptionEn: The mountains and waters echo with clarity.

title: 岸立無絃琴(北海岸鼻頭角)
titleEn: Silent Zither by the Shore
description: 岸立無絃琴，浪敲太古音；長歌頌海韻，墨筆寫深心。
descriptionEn: Upon the shore stands a silent zither, Waves strike the ancient notes; In long songs, I praise the ocean's melody, With ink and brush, I inscribe my deepest heart.

title: 帛書中堂-渡船人
titleEn: Silken Scroll: The Ferryman

title: 律回冰雪少(牡丹、梅花)
titleEn: Harmony of Frost and Bloom

title: 月梅圖-形影神
titleEn: Moonlit Plum Blossoms: Spirit and Shadow
description: 陶淵明形影神詩
descriptionEn: The Poem of the Spirit and Shadow of Tao Yuanming

title: 木落山常在
titleEn: Timeless Mountains Amidst Falling Leaves

title: 東籬秋菊
titleEn: Autumn Chrysanthemums by the Eastern Fence

title: 桃花源
titleEn: Peach Blossom Spring
description: 天開圖畫，會意神馳，煙嵐水氣，萬象具融。
descriptionEn: The heavens unveil their canvas, where thoughts and spirits soar; In the mist and water's breath, all wonders blend and pour.

title: 梅竹爭春
titleEn: Plum and Bamboo Compete for Spring
description: 鵲能知雪霽,梅不怕霜侵。
descriptionEn: The magpie knows when the snow has cleared, The plum blossom stands unafraid of frost's embrace.

title: 梅花-漫放清氣滿乾坤
titleEn: Plum Blossoms - Unfurling Fragrance, Enveloping the Cosmos
description: 書窗一夜梅初綻，漫放清氣滿乾坤。
descriptionEn: In the window, a night of ink, the plum blossoms first unfold, Releasing their pure fragrance, filling the universe bold.

title: 梅花小鳥
titleEn: Plum Blossom and Songbird
description: 梅色分紅白
descriptionEn: The hues of plum blossom divide between red and white.

title: 楓紅萬點舞秋聲-秋瀑
titleEn: Autumn's Dance of Crimson Leaves
description: 銀瀑三疊歌自在，楓紅萬點舞秋聲。
descriptionEn: Silver cascades in threefold song, Maple leaves dance, a myriad in autumn's throng.

title: 活水潤物天地春-春瀑
titleEn: Spring Cascade: Waters of Renewal
description: 江流白雲花經眼，活水潤物天地春。
descriptionEn: The river flows, white clouds drift by, Flowers dance before the eye. Living waters nourish all, In springtime's embrace, the world stands tall.

title: 涼風吹月露
titleEn: Cool Breeze, Moonlit Dew
description: 南朝齊人謝眺和王中丞聞琴詩台中縣美展入選
descriptionEn: By Xie Tiao of the Southern Qi, in harmony with Wang Zhongcheng, upon hearing the qin, for the selection at the Meizhan Exhibition in Taichung County.

title: 涼風吹月露
titleEn: Cool Breeze, Moonlit Dew
description: 南朝齊人謝眺和王中丞聞琴詩台中縣美展入選
descriptionEn: Sure! Here’s an elegant translation of the inscription: By Xie Tiao of the Southern Qi, in harmony with Wang Zhongcheng, upon hearing the qin, selected for the art exhibition in Taizhong County.

title: 溪頭秋色
titleEn: Autumn Colors by the Stream
description: 花繁樹茂滿溪頭，碧水竹橋景色幽；遊客穿梭天上過，涼亭小憩賞清秋。
descriptionEn: In bloom the flowers, lush the trees by the stream's embrace, Where emerald waters and bamboo bridges weave a tranquil grace; Visitors drift like clouds through the heavens above, In the cool pavilion, they pause to savor autumn's love.

title: 漢隸條幅-宋楊萬里中元日曉登碧落堂詩
titleEn: Han Calligraphy Scroll: Yang Wanli's Poem on the Dawn of the Zhongyuan Festival at Biluotang

title: 漢隸條幅-蘇子瞻惠崇春江小景詩
titleEn: Spring River Scenes: A Poem by Su Zizhan in Han Script

title: 無所有(帛書創作)
titleEn: Nothingness (Silk Manuscript Creation)

title: 無極萬瀑流
titleEn: Eternal Cascades
description: 無極萬瀑流，滌盡古今愁；悠悠泱雲湧，忘機物外遊。
descriptionEn: Endless cascades in boundless flow, washing away the sorrows of ages past; In the vastness, clouds drift and surge, forgetting the world, wandering beyond the mundane.

title: 煙嵐掩映－溪頭煙霧
titleEn: Veiled in Mist – The Fog of the Streamhead
description: 氤氳山容僊路遠，冥濛溪色野村閒；幽人奚事尋難遇，只見稍頭雙鳥還。
descriptionEn: In the misty embrace of mountains, the path to immortality stretches far, In the dim haze, the stream reflects the tranquil village afar; What concern has the recluse in seeking the rare and elusive? Only glimpsing, at the break of dawn, two birds returning from afar.

title: 煙擁合歡
titleEn: Lotus Embraced by Mist
description: 煙擁合歡，霧潤良疇，碧山含笑，雲凝翠黛，天然節奏，有象文章，風光綿延，機趣無窮。
descriptionEn: Embraced by mist, the lotus blooms, Dew graces the fertile fields, Emerald hills wear a smile, Clouds gather in verdant hues. Nature's rhythm flows with ease, In every image, words take form, Scenery stretches, endless and grand, With boundless charm and playful grace.

title: 煙聲一縷一塵埃-大瀑布
titleEn: Whispers of Mist and Dust: The Great Waterfall
description: 放眼大千境始開，烟聲一縷一塵埃；飛天素染無盡意，流水行雲去復來。
descriptionEn: With a gaze that embraces the vast expanse, the world unfolds; A whisper of mist carries a trace of dust. In the boundless essence of the heavens, pure and serene, The flowing waters and drifting clouds come and go.

title: 牡丹品貴冠群芳
titleEn: Peony: The Noble Crown Among Blossoms
description: 牡丹品貴冠群芳，覽豐迎校滿庭芳。105
descriptionEn: The peony, noble in its grace, outshines all blooms in this place; In splendid view, it greets the day, filling the garden with sweet bouquet.

title: 牡丹花開淡墨香
titleEn: Peonies Bloom with a Whisper of Ink
description: 嫣紅魏紫與姚黃，朵朵花開淡墨香；富貴白頭春不老，迎風映日滿庭芳。
descriptionEn: With rosy hues of crimson and violet, Blossoms unfold, perfumed in soft ink; In wealth and honor, may we age gracefully, As spring endures, our garden blooms in fragrant light.

title: 瑞雪映天心
titleEn: Auspicious Snow, Heart of Heaven
description: 瑞雪映天心
descriptionEn: The Auspicious Snow Reflects the Heart of Heaven

title: 甲骨文條幅-調寄漁家樂
titleEn: Oracle Bone Script Scroll - A Tune of Fisherman's Joy
description: 丁亥
descriptionEn: The Year of the Earth Pig

title: 碧山含笑－青綠山水
titleEn: Emerald Peaks in Smiles
description: 碧山含笑，機趣無窮。(山水-橫幅)
descriptionEn: Emerald mountains wear a smile, endless charm in their grace.

title: 秋月月偏明(漢隸)
titleEn: The Autumn Moon's Gentle Glow
description: 唐張南史和崔中丞中秋月詩台中縣美展入選
descriptionEn: Selected for the Autumn Moon Poem Exhibition in Taichung County, by Zhang Nanshi of the Tang Dynasty and Cui Zhongcheng.

title: 秋月月偏明(漢隸)
titleEn: The Autumn Moon Shines Brightly
description: 唐張南史和崔中丞中秋月詩台中縣美展入選
descriptionEn: Here lies the inscription of a poem by Zhang Nanshi of the Tang Dynasty, in honor of the Mid-Autumn Moon, selected for the Art Exhibition in Taichung County, alongside the esteemed Cui Zhongcheng.

title: 秋瀑
titleEn: Autumn Cascade
description: 人入畫圖中
descriptionEn: One Enters the Realm of Art

title: 竹影搖牕－墨竹
titleEn: Shadows of Bamboo Dancing by the Window
description: 竹影搖牕當畫圖
descriptionEn: The bamboo shadows sway, painting the window's view.

title: 筆走雷霆萬壑鳴-夏瀑
titleEn: Thunderous Brushstrokes: Summer Falls
description: 墨潑飛瀑三千尺，筆走雷霆萬壑鳴。
descriptionEn: Inky splashes cascade three thousand feet, Brushstrokes unleash thunder in ten thousand ravines.

title: 篆書對聯 x 2
titleEn: Couplets in Seal Script

title: 紙上雲煙
titleEn: Clouds and Smoke on Paper
description: 千秋筆墨驚天地，萬里雲山入畫圖。
descriptionEn: With ink that stirs the heavens through the ages, And mountains and clouds spanning miles, a painted view.

title: 紙上雲煙
titleEn: Clouds and Smoke on Paper
description: 千秋筆墨驚天地，萬里雲山入畫圖。
descriptionEn: In ink and brush, a thousand autumns astound the world, In clouds and mountains, ten thousand miles become a painted scene.

title: 紫藤-春風應以到天涯
titleEn: Wisteria - Spring Breeze to the Horizon

title: 結廬人境外(漢隸)
titleEn: Cottage Beyond the Human Realm
description: 清敬安禪師住山吟為與了上人作詩中縣美展第二名
descriptionEn: Composed by Master Qingjing'an in the Mountain Retreat, in honor of the esteemed Laoshang, awarded second place in the County Art Exhibition.

title: 緣圓以圓緣-四個月亮
titleEn: Circles of Fate: Four Moons
description: 緣圓以圓緣，水墨染混沌，好鳥共此時，清梅映天心，皎月掀凡情，彩筆蘊我神，相思渾未了，圓圓復圓圓。
descriptionEn: Bound by the circle of fate, In ink and water, chaos blends. Good birds sing in this moment, While pure plum blossoms reflect the heart of heaven. The bright moon stirs earthly emotions, As vibrant brushes cradle my spirit. Longing lingers, never to fade, In circles round and round once more.

title: 聚葉潑成千點墨－畫菊
titleEn: Splashes of Ink from Gathered Leaves: A Chrysanthemum Painting
description: 詩餘戲筆不知狂，豈是丹青費較量？聚葉潑成千點墨，攢花染出幾痕霜。淡濃神會風前影，跳脫秋生腕底香。莫認東籬閑采掇，黏屏聊以慰重陽。
descriptionEn: After the verses, I play with my brush in a wild spirit, Is it not a futile contest of colors and hues? Gathering leaves, I splash a thousand dots of ink, Piling flowers, I dye a few traces of frost. In the subtle interplay of light and shade, I grasp the shadows before the wind, Breaking free, autumn's fragrance dances from my wrist. Do not mistake the idle gathering at the eastern fence, For I linger here, seeking solace on the Double Ninth.

title: 自在
titleEn: In Tranquility
description: 長形小山水【自在】
descriptionEn: Serene Waters of the Long-Shaped Hills【In Tranquility】

title: 般若波羅蜜多心經(草書)
titleEn: Heart Sutra of Perfect Wisdom (Cursive Script)

title: 般若波羅蜜多心經(隸書)
titleEn: Heart Sutra of Prajnaparamita (Clerical Script)

title: 花能解語－問菊
titleEn: Whispers of Blossoms – Inquiring of the Chrysanthemum
description: 欲訊秋情眾莫知，喃喃負手扣東籬：孤標傲世偕誰隱？一樣開花為底遲？圃露庭霜何寂寞？雁歸蝨病可相思？莫言舉世無談者，解語何妨話片時。
descriptionEn: To inquire of autumn's feelings, few can comprehend, Murmuring softly, hands clasped, I lean on the eastern fence. Who shares this solitary pride, hidden from the world? Yet blooms alike, why must they delay in their time? In the garden, dew and frost bring such solitude, As the wild geese return, can longing ease the ache? Do not say there are none to converse in this world, What harm is there in sharing a few words for a while?

title: 草書條幅
titleEn: Scroll of Cursive Script

title: 草書條幅-司空曙望水詩
titleEn: Cursive Scroll: Poem by Si Kong Shu on Gazing at Water

title: 菅芒花的春天
titleEn: Spring of the Reed Flowers
description: 萬頃菅芒，浩浩湯湯，龜山渺渺，屹立蒼茫!煙波徜徉，詩心商商。雲水深處，是我家鄉。
descriptionEn: In fields of reeds that stretch for miles, Where vast waters flow in endless styles, Mount Turtle stands, a silhouette so grand, Amidst the boundless, misty land. Waves of smoke and ripples dance, In the heart of poetry, I find my chance. In the depths of clouds and flowing streams, Lies the essence of my homeland's dreams.

title: 萬疋白綾落九天－萬瀑奔騰
titleEn: Silken Falls: The Rushing Cascade
description: 疋白綾落九天，千尋峭壁若無邊；巨流呼嘯奔深壑，更入我眼注心田。
descriptionEn: A strip of white silk descends from the heavens, A thousand fathoms of sheer cliffs stretch endlessly; The mighty torrent roars as it rushes into the deep ravine, It flows into my eyes, imprinting upon my heart.

title: 萬縷紫煙舞韶華－紫藤花
titleEn: Dancing Purple Wisps of Wisteria
description: 一雙好鳥飛自在，萬縷紫煙舞韶華。
descriptionEn: A pair of fine birds soars with ease, As myriad purple wisps dance through spring's grace.

title: 萬頃煙聲寄相思-冬瀑
titleEn: Echoes of Longing: Winter Falls
description: 千潯飛瀑飄雪白，萬頃煙聲寄相思。
descriptionEn: A thousand streams cascade in snowy white, Ten thousand acres echo with longing's sigh.

title: 行草中堂-聖教序
titleEn: Running Script in the Hall - Ode to the Sacred Teachings

title: 賞觀籬菊可忘憂
titleEn: Gazing at the Chrysanthemums, Worries Fade Away

title: 赤壁賦(行草)
titleEn: Ode to the Red Cliffs (Xingcao)

title: 輝映海天萬里金－鰲鼓夕照
titleEn: Golden Reflections of Sea and Sky: Evening Glow at Aogu
description: 無邊雲霞自去來，輝映海天萬里金；而今得結煙霞侶，休管人生幻與真。
descriptionEn: Endless clouds and rosy hues drift freely, Illuminating the sea and sky with golden gleam; Now I find a companion in mist and twilight, Let not the illusions of life disturb our dream.

title: 銀瀑落青天
titleEn: Silver Falls from the Azure Sky
description: 銀瀑落青天，騰奔入世間；浮煙空潤物，大化自循環。
descriptionEn: Silver cascades descend from the azure sky, Rushing forth into the realm of man; Floating mist gently nourishes all, The great transformation flows in endless cycle.

title: 阮籍永懷詩
titleEn: Eternal Longing of Ruan Ji
description: 97台中縣美展
descriptionEn: 97th Taichung County Art Exhibition

title: 隸書中堂-般若波羅蜜多心經(隸書)
titleEn: Calligraphy of the Heart Sutra in Clerical Script

title: 雙雙瓦雀(楷書條幅)
titleEn: Twin Sparrows on the Eaves

title: 雲山縹緲(稻田)
titleEn: Ethereal Clouds over Rice Fields

title: 雲濤萬頃舞穹蒼（黃山雲瀑）
titleEn: Dancing Clouds Over Vast Waters
description: 雲瀑騰奔去，砥根立圖間；古今豈增減？大化自循環。
descriptionEn: The clouds cascade and soar away, While steadfast roots uphold the scene; What of the past and present's sway? Great transformations flow unseen.

title: 雲白任舒卷－玉山白木林
titleEn: Clouds Unfurl in White - Mt. Jade's Whitewood Grove
description: 雲白任舒卷，林深霜葉紅；乍疑方外好，不與世間同。
descriptionEn: Clouds drift freely, white and unbound, In deep woods, frost-kissed leaves turn red; For a moment, I ponder the joys beyond, Choosing not to dwell with the world's tread.

title: 雲端北峰風在吹
titleEn: Wind Blows on the Northern Peak Above the Clouds

title: 雲自來去花自紅─玉山‧杜鵑‧雲海
titleEn: Clouds Come and Go, Flowers Bloom in Their Time: Yushan, Azalea, Sea of Clouds
description: 無限江山千里外，雲自來去花自紅。
descriptionEn: Beyond the boundless rivers and mountains, a thousand miles away, Clouds drift in and out, while flowers bloom in their own time.

title: 飛鷹圖
titleEn: Eagle in Flight
